author: franzoni
body:
The Payload inspector (PI) is a facility accessible via the [AlCa/Db conditions browser](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/) to visualize the content of payloads available in the conditions database; the PI discovers c++ classes in CMSSW and uses them to display the deserialized payload content in graphs customised by the calibration experts.
In this pull request (which does not affect CMS standard processing sequences):
   * general refurbishing of the c++ PI base classes
   * inclusion of new types of plots; calibration experts can inerit form them in their developments of customised views and charts to display conditions;
   * current types are : History, RunHistory, TimeHistory, Scatter, Histo1D and Histo2D
   * more details here in the [PI documentation twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMS/CmsDbBrowser#The_Payload_Inspector)
title: refurbishing of Payload Inspector
